name: Block Puzzle Master
description:
Block Puzzle Master - Block Classic Puzzle Game
This is a perfect puzzle game with the simple rules and without any limits!
Run and enjoy this puzzle game!
Let's enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game, Block Puzzle Master.
Beautiful user interface, and comfortable operation will make you forget the time. You just need one finger to tap the screen to move the block! The goal is very simple: move various blocks to fit them all in the background. Sounds easy? Not really. It is a brain game. you should have more try.

FEATURES
- Easy to learn and play.
- Compare with friends with leaderboard
- courful block.
- Beautiful user interface, and comfortable operation.
